name: A Crab's Life
description:
Meet Crabert. He's a hard working crustacean with one goal: to marry his girlfriend. But she's a little... demanding... to say the least. Can you help Crabert convince Crabette to be his wife?

Be careful though! The island Crabert and Crabette call home is a dangerous place. There are territorial seagulls and dangerous sharks. Every day is perilous.

The directional keys move Crabert around his home.

The spacebar interacts with Crabette and picks up objects.
